name: In the Matter of the ADOPTION OF Henry Augustus HUTCHINS, IV. Appeal of Henry Augustus HUTCHINS, III
name_abbreviation: In re the Adoption of Hutchins

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDER-MOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: In the Matter of the ADOPTION OF Henry Augustus HUTCHINS, IV. Appeal of Henry Augustus HUTCHINS, III.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
THE ORDER OF THE SUPERIOR COURT IS AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: James A. Pitonyak, Erie, for appellant.
Stephanie Domitrovich, Erie, for Henry Augustus Hutch-ins, IV.
Marilyn Woolery, Erie, for Patricia Ann Moore Clark.
casebody.head_matter:
492 A.2d 1119
In the Matter of the ADOPTION OF Henry Augustus HUTCHINS, IV. Appeal of Henry Augustus HUTCHINS, III.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted March 8, 1985.
Decided May 31, 1985.
James A. Pitonyak, Erie, for appellant.
Stephanie Domitrovich, Erie, for Henry Augustus Hutch-ins, IV.
Marilyn Woolery, Erie, for Patricia Ann Moore Clark.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDER-MOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, JJ.
